Hey there :wave: Thank you for using CubHours! I'm here to help you manage your team's time contributions.
Here's a few commands to know:
*:one: Use the `/doorbell` command*. Type `/doorbell` to ring the doorbell.
*:two: Setup your account.* Type `/setup` to configure your ID for the scanner.

elements.text: :question: Get help at any time with `/help`
